definition: used in expressions of the form 照□不誤|照□不误[zhao4 xx5 bu4 wu4], in which □ is a verb, 照[zhao4] means "as before", and the overall meaning is "carry on (doing sth) regardless" or "continue (to do sth) in spite of changed circumstances", e.g. 照買不誤|照买不误[zhao4 mai3 bu4 wu4], to keep on buying (a product) regardless (of price hikes)
(negative prefix)/not/no
mistake/error/to miss/to harm/to delay/to neglect/mistakenly
lit. sharpening the axe won't make the wood-splitting take longer (idiom)/fig. time invested in preparations is not lost/a beard well lathered is half shaved
pinyin: mo2 dao1 bu4 wu4 kan3 chai2 gong1

definition: to neglect neither one
to keep on buying (a product) regardless (of price increases, adverse publicity etc)

sentences.english: If they want me to fight Andre Berto or Paul Williams, I'll do it.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们想要我打贝托或威廉姆斯，我也照打不误。

sentences.english: You can't miss out on love or studying.
sentences.chinese: 真是恋爱学业两不误啊。

sentences.english: Find out what makes Laura feel most loved and do it.
sentences.chinese: 弄清楚什么最能让劳拉感受到爱，并照做不误。
格伦的演讲词说得一字不误。

sentences.english: They knew they had to drown villages. But they did it.
sentences.chinese: 明知道会淹没村庄，但他们还是照做不误。

sentences.english: Although the doctor ordered him not to smoke, the patient kept on smoking.
sentences.chinese: 虽然医生命令不得抽烟，这个病人却照吸不误。

sentences.english: Someone else's kid throws up at a party. You keep eating.
sentences.chinese: 别人的孩子在某次聚会上吐了，而你能照吃不误。

definition: as before/(same) as usual/in the same manner/still/nevertheless
to do as instructed/to comply
as before/as in the past
to follow the rules/to do as instructed/to play by the book/to comply with a request
fearless/not worried (by setbacks or difficulties)/even if/even though
lit. wind past your ear/fig. sth you don't pay much attention to/in one ear and out the other
approved for distribution/to provide (wages etc) as usual (e.g. while an employee is on maternity leave)
to have no right or ability to interfere in sth/it's none of your business!
to accept without question/to take sth at face value
solely engrossed in one thing/just (one thing, no need to worry about the rest)/simply/by all means/please feel free/do not hesitate (to ask for sth)
lit. wind past your ear/fig. sth you don't pay much attention to/in one ear and out the other
lit. knives rain down from the sky (idiom)/fig. (even if) the sky crumbles
golden rule/key principle
once bitten by a snake, ten years in fear of a well rope/once bitten, twice shy (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 zhao1 bei4 she2 yao3 , shi2 nian2 pa4 jing3 sheng2
related.word: 一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳

definition: all/without any exceptions/categorically
lit. to treat (what sb says) as wind past your ear/fig. to completely disregard
